Posts.Content: Saddaysahead wrote: My sister was just diagnosed with Stage IV Breast cancer. She has 3 children 6 years of age and younger and no health insurance. She has been told they will not start treatment plans until she has insurance. We went to the department of Social Services and they seemed less than helpful. We live in Rochester, NY and I am just looking for ideas of places we can try so she can start getting the treatments she needs. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with Stage IV Breast Cancer and no insurance. Help?! Saddaysahead vickib
